revised_title: Compositions and Partitions of Numbers: A Study on Permutations and Combinations
tldr: This article explores the compositions and partitions of numbers, focusing on permutations and combinations. The author introduces a new method for representing these concepts graphically and uses this method to analyze various types of compositions and partitions. The article also discusses the number of permutations with a given descending specification and the relationship between different compositions and partitions.
